course_title: Case Studies in Infectious Disease Epidemiology
class_notes: Pre-requisite: EPI 504 or EPI 530 (concurrent ok), or instructor permission. Cross-listed with GH 517.
course_description: Provides training in the investigation, control, and prevention of infectious disease by both descriptive and analytic epidemiological techniques.
schedule_location: T 10:10am-12pm in Claudia Nance Rollins AUD
sections: Class Nbr: 5186, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 10:10a-12p, Instructor: Spaulding/Fairley, Status: Open
